resources.string: Providing ease to the drivers through navigation!
Not have an account? Signup Now

Living in cities could get a little hectic at times especially when you need to find a free space to park your vehicle, you follow the traditional way of driving around the roads to find parking plaza but what if there is an app that does the same for you? The “Park At Ease” does this work in seconds. This android app will not only show the available parking slots in different plazas within particular range of area but also tells you the shortest way to get to selected plaza. This app could help save you time and also your fuel.The app tells the exact location of the closest parking plaza with available slots in real time.
